record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - April 24, 2008)

[Page: H2663]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks on the bill H.R. 2830, the Coast Guard Reauthorization Act.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Minnesota?
